title: Meserii E-Commerce UI (Demo Clone)
description: A React-based eCommerce frontend inspired by the Meserii website. Includes product listings, category-based browsing, reusable components, responsive layouts, and scalable UI architecture using Tailwind CSS.

title: Product & Services Listing Platform
description: A scalable listing-style web application featuring category pages, structured layouts, and detail views. Designed with future backend and database integration in mind.

title: Job Listing & Blog Platform (React UI)
description: A job-oriented frontend platform combining structured listings with blog-style content. Focused on routing, layout consistency, and content-driven UI patterns using React.

title: Investment & Finance Landing Page
description: A modern investment-themed landing page designed for clarity, trust, and performance. Built with Tailwind CSS and component-based layout structure.

title: Business / Agency Website (Technofyree)
description: A professional multi-section business website focused on brand identity, clean UI presentation, and responsive user experience.

title: Personal Developer Portfolio
description: My primary developer portfolio showcasing projects, skills, and experience. Built with modern frontend tooling with a strong focus on performance and professional presentation.

title: Client Portfolio / Profile Website
description: A minimal personal profile website demonstrating clean layout structuring, responsive design, and content hierarchy.

title: Snake Game (JavaScript)
description: A classic Snake game built using vanilla JavaScript, focusing on DOM manipulation, game logic, keyboard events, and performance-friendly rendering.

title: Media Player Web Application
description: A custom audio/video player built with JavaScript featuring playback controls, UI state management, and responsive behavior.

title: Destination / Travel-Themed Website
description: A responsive destination-focused website emphasizing clean layout, visual hierarchy, reusable components, and smooth user experience suitable for travel and tourism platforms.
